mapper.insert: insert into bind_history (ep_uid, device_id, type, time, which_round_same, which_round_diff) value ( #{ep_uid}, #{device_id}, #{type}, #{time}, #{which_round_same}, #{which_round_diff} )
mapper.update:
update bind_history
ep_uid = #{ep_uid},
device_id = #{device_id},
type = #{type},
time = #{time},
which_round_same = #{which_round_same},
which_round_diff = #{which_round_diff},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, ep_uid, device_id, type, time, which_round_same, which_round_diff from bind_history where ep_uid = #{ep_uid} and time is not null order by time desc limit 1

select id, ep_uid, device_id, type, time, which_round_same, which_round_diff from bind_history where ep_uid = #{uid} and time is not null and time >= #{start} and time <= date_add(#{start}, interval #{range} day) order by time desc limit 0,1
